name: Siebel: BusComp's name should have an initial capitalized letter and no special characters
description:
The quality rule reports the Business Components not compliant with the following naming convention:
initial capitalized letter
absence of any of the following sepecial characters : @ # % *
output: This rule reports Business Components with an invalid name
rationale: Naming conventions improve readability and understanding of a program
remediation: Change name according to the naming convention
alternativeName: Siebel: BusComp's name should have an initial capitalized letter and no special characters
